p: Total flavonoid content was measured according to a previously described method with some modifications ( 23). Briefly, 20 µl HBL, HBB or HBF (50 mg/ml), 80 µl distilled water and 6 µl 5% NaNO 2 were mixed and incubated for 5 min at room temperature. Next, 12 µl 10% AlCl 3·6H 2O was added and the mixture was incubated at room temperature. After 6 min, 40 µl 1 M NaOH was added and the mixture was incubated for 11 min at room temperature. Finally, the absorbance was measured at 510 nm using a UV/visible spectrophotometer (Xma-3000PC).
